<xen:controlunit label="{xen:phrase Team_default_associate_forum}:">{$config.node.node_title}</xen:controlunit>
<input type="hidden" name="config[db][host]" value="{$config.db.host}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[db][port]" value="{$config.db.port}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[db][username]" value="{$config.db.username}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[db][password]" value="{$config.db.password}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[db][dbname]" value="{$config.db.dbname}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[dir][data]" value="{$config.dir.data}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[dir][internal_data]" value="{$config.dir.internal_data}" /> <input type="hidden" name="config[node][node_id]" value="{$config.node.node_id}" />
<input type="hidden" name="config[retain_keys]" value="{$config.retain_keys}" /> <xen:else /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase mysql_server}:" name="config[db][host]" value="{$input.db.host}" placeholder="$config['db']['host']" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase mysql_port}:" name="config[db][port]" value="{$input.db.port}" placeholder="$config['db']['port']" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase mysql_user_name}:" name="config[db][username]" value="{$input.db.username}" placeholder="$config['db']['username']" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase mysql_password}:" name="config[db][password]" value="{$input.db.password}" placeholder="$config['db']['password']" autocomplete="off" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase mysql_database_name}:" name="config[db][dbname]" value="{$input.db.dbname}" placeholder="$config['db']['dbname']" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase data_directory}:" name="config[dir][data]" value="{$input.dir.data}" placeholder="/path/to/data" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase internal_data_directory}:" name="config[dir][internal_data]" value="{$input.dir.internal_data}" placeholder="/path/to/internal_data"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase import_xenforo_config_data_dirs_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:selectunit name="config[node][node_id]" value="{$config.node_id}" label="{xen:phrase Team_default_associate_forum}:" explain="{xen:phrase Team_default_associate_forum_explain}"> <xen:option value="0">{xen:phrase disable}</xen:option> <xen:options source="$nodeOptions" /> </xen:selectunit>
<input type="hidden" name="config[retain_keys]" value="{$retainKeys}" /> </xen:if>

<input type="hidden" name="importer" value="{$importer}" /> </xen:form>

phrases.phrase: Disable the tab Media. All media associate with group will be temporary disable.
If checked, sub categories will be hidden.
The maximum of characters which allow user can comment.
The background color which be used in cover maker.
The font will be used while creating the cover. The value should be absolute path.
Ranges from 0 (worst quality, smaller file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file).
The color which be used in cover maker.
Show ONLY the information tab to non-members
If checked, the information tab alone will be shown to non-members viewing a group.
When new group published, this rules auto fill to that group. With old groups without rules, you need to rebuild Groups Cache to resolve it.
Enter the words or phrases that are disallowed in ribbon text. All censored words are automatically disallowed. Place each word or phrase on separate lines.
If enabled, an new cover created by base group name will be replaced by default cover.
If enabled, all groups which did not have an custom Logo will be have one by auto make with 2 letters of group name. Eg: Your group is Test Awesome Name so the logo will be: TA
Automatic converting event start/end time to user timezone
If enabled, event start and end time convert to user timezone. It is make more readable to users.
The maximum number of characters that can be in a description. This includes BB code. Use 0 to disable the limit.
The layout will be display first when loading event list page.
Number of featured groups in slider
The number of features will be show in slider. It alway randomize. Set to 0 to disable.
The day that each week begins. More information
The background color which be used in logo maker.
The font will be used while creating the logo. The value should be absolute path.
Ranges from 0 (worst quality, smaller file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file).
The color which be used in maker logo.
The length of message can send. Set 0 to disable this function.
Limited the groups which users can create. Anyone have permission 'Bypass maximum of create groups' will be ignore this option.
Limited the groups which users can be apart. That include groups user owner. Anyone have permission 'Bypass maximum of groups can join' will be ignore by this option.
Display Member Wall when member viewing group
Load the member wall when member viewing an group.
The number of messages show in page.
The position of groups on navigation.
Load NewsFeed Items Before Trigger Infinite Scrolling
The number of newsfeed items loaded before trigger infinite scrolling. This option will make an huge queries on group home page. So consider to use the large items.
The number of threads (group threads) will be shown.
The cutoff date which when members inactive in groups will receive an alert to reminder. Set to 0 to disable this function.
The maximum of rules length which allow fillable.
Show all albums/media on provider index
Enable this if you want to show all photos/media of groups to provider index. (Apply to open and closed groups). By default it only available on group only.
If enabled, the privacy of group will be shown while creating group.
Enable/Disable the auto play on Features Slide.
The total of items show an slide.
The number of groups that will be listed per page, including on the group and category overview pages.
The time of between reminders. Members receive next reminder from the previous reminder. If value is 0, members only receive a reminder.
Display time format on event create.
The maximum number of groups to display in the top groups list in group navigation. Use 0 to disable this block.
The number of threads (group threads) will be shown.
The category which will store all media created within groups. If the value not valid, the photos tab will be disabled.
Hide XenMedia category store in list
By checked option, the category for store will be hidden on Media Index. Some items belong to this category still appear somewhere.
Delete posts in group by anyone
Hard-delete posts in group by self
Edit posts in group by anyone
Edit posts in group by self
Edit title & tag line by self
Bypass maximum of groups can join
The maximum items can display in row.
The properties control newsfeed card container.
Styling for Team state such as: warning, deleted, unapproved,...
The properties effect to all author images. (Author of feed and comments)
Hei! Don't forget us, we miss you. Visit our group to get latest news: {group_title}
If enabled, group owner can enable tabs which disable in this category.
If checked, only group members can comment on this Event. Admins and Group Admins can always comment.
If enabled, only members can post content.
Anyone, including non-members, can post content.
If a user does not have permission to create groups, this setting will not apply.
All posts must be approved by a moderator.
All groups within this category will be deleted and any child categories will be attached to this category's parent.
All posts must be approved by a moderator.
Always moderate groups published in this category
Ask to join with a brief message.
The automatically created thread will be given this prefix.
Automatically Create Thread in Forum (New Groups)
Any members inactive in special time will be remove group. Set to 0 to disable this function.
Please upload an image that is at least 280x280 pixels
The member {member_name} still waiting a confirm. You can not promote this member.
This category does not allow new groups to be created.
You do not have permission to create groups in this category.
[USER={userId}]{name}[/USER] changed the group privacy setting from {old} to {new}.

IMPORTANT: Whenever you change the value of Logo or Cover such as text color, text font, background color,... Please take a few seconds to delete all files cached. You can find the cached files at: internal_data/groups/* Or just click this link to delete all files: Delete all cached files...
Are you want to delete this post? This also delete all comments on this post.
I agree to the group rules.
If entered, the URL to this group will not contain an ID. Use a-z, 0-9, _, and - characters only. Note that once specified, you can't change it again.
The image will be display to groups which does not have custom cover. If empty, this value will be used: styles/Nobita/Teams/default.png
The default privacy that is applied to new groups in this category.
Disable events page. Also disable all actions on event. eg: create, edit, delete, view, etc
Disable the tab forums. All threads associate with group will be disconnected.
If disable, members can't view the list of members in group. Admin view that page normal.
Disable the photo tab. All photos associate with group will be temporary disable.
Disable the tab Rules. Members did not see the tab on navigation but still viewable.
If disable, so all members can't view page and can't post content to page.

<xen:comment>BEGIN PUBLIC CONTROL CSS</xen:comment>
.Team_PublicControls {
	margin-left: -8px;
	margin-right: -8px;
}
	.Team_PublicControls .Team_PublicControlsInner {
		padding: 8px;
		background-color: {xen:property primaryLightest};
	}
.Team_PublicControlsInner>* {
	display: inline-block;
	font-size: 12px;
    	padding-left: 10px;
    	color: {xen:property primaryMedium};
}
	.Team_PublicControlsInner>a:hover {
		cursor: pointer;
		text-decoration: underline;
	}
.Team_PublicControlsInner .material-icons {
	font-size: 14px;
    	padding-right: 4px;
    	vertical-align: top;
}
.Team_PublicControlsInner>*:first-child {
	padding-left: 0px;
}
	.Team_PublicControlsInner a.like .material-icons:before {
		content: 'thumb_up';
	}
	.Team_PublicControlsInner a.unlike .material-icons:before {
		content: 'thumb_down';
	}
	.Team_PublicControls .likesSummary {
		background-image: none;
		border-bottom: none;
	}
.Team_SupportTextHtml {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
	overflow: hidden;
	position: relative;
    	width: 100%;
    	height: auto;
}
.Team_SupportTextHtml iframe,
.Team_SupportTextHtml image,
.Team_SupportTextHtml media {
	max-width: 100%;
}
.Team_WatchUnwatchContent.unwatch .material-icons:before {
	content: 'notifications_off';
}
.Team_WatchUnwatchContent.watch .material-icons:before {
	content: 'notifications';
}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase statistics}</xen:title>

<xen:include template="Team_stats_base" />

<script>

jQuery(function()
{
	var data =
	[
	<xen:foreach loop="$plots" key="$contentType" value="$plot" i="$i">
		{
			label: "{xen:jsescape {$statsTypePhrases.{$contentType}}}",
			contentType: "{xen:jsescape $contentType}",
			data: {xen:helper json, $plot}
		},
	</xen:foreach>
		{}
	],
	options =
	{
		series:
		{
			points: { show: true },
			lines: { show: true }
		},
		grid:
		{
			show: true,
			hoverable: true,
			borderWidth: 1,
			color: '{xen:property primaryMedium}',
			backgroundColor: '{xen:property primaryLightest}'
		},
		colors: [ '{xen:property primaryMedium}', '{xen:property secondaryMedium}', '{xen:property primaryLight}', '{xen:property secondaryLight}' ],
		xaxis: {
		<xen:if is="{$groupingConfig.xAxisTime}">
			mode: 'time'
		<xen:else />
			tickFormatter: function(n)
			{
	 			for (var t in dateMap)
	 			{
	 				if (dateMap[t][n])
	 				{
	 					return dateMap[t][n];
	 				}
	 				else if (dateMap[t][n / 1000])
	 				{
	 					return dateMap[t][n / 1000];
	 				}
	 			}
					
				return '';
			}
		</xen:if>
		}
	},
	$placeholder = $('#Placeholder'),
	$tooltip = $('#StatsTooltip').appendTo('body').css('position', 'absolute'),
	prevDataIndex = null,
	dateMap = {xen:helper json, $dateMap};
	
	$.plot($placeholder, data, options);
	
	$placeholder.bind('plothover', function(e, pos, item)
	{
		if (item !== null)
		{
			if (item.dataIndex != prevDataIndex)
			{
				var browserWidth = $('html').width(),
					dateString = dateMap[item.series.contentType][item.datapoint[0]]
						|| dateMap[item.series.contentType][item.datapoint[0] / 1000]  
						|| new Date(item.datapoint[0]).toDateString();
									
				prevDataIndex = item.dataIndex;
				
				$tooltip.hide().find('span.text').html(dateString + ', ' + item.series.label + ': ' + new String(item.datapoint[1]).bold());
								
				$tooltip.css(
				{
					<xen:if is="{$pageIsRtl}">
					left: item.pageX - 14,
					<xen:else />
					right: browserWidth - item.pageX - 14,
					</xen:if>
					top: item.pageY - 38
				})
				.fadeIn(XenForo.speed.fast);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			$('#StatsTooltip').hide();
			prevDataIndex = null;
		}
	});
});

</script>
